description: Many hope the slowing death rate means lockdown measures, imposed weeks ago, are having an impact.
title: Coronavirus: Spanish deaths fall for fourth consecutive day
title_page: Coronavirus: Spanish deaths fall for fourth consecutive day - BBC News
maintext: In Austria, where a total of 220 deaths have been reported, Chancellor Sebastian Kurz announced plans to begin easing some of the restrictions imposed there. If Austrians continued to comply with the current measures, smaller, non-essential shops could be allowed to re-open in just over a week's time, he said.
